summary: This is the pre-release version 3 of The Dragonborn Legacy. It adds a number of perks to enhance your shouts including the entrance of a new dungeon called Snowcrag Depths.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/2647636/DragonbornLegacyTitle1A.png[/img][/center]

v10A
As promised on the thread, I\'ve put out a weekend release! 
- Relocated the main exterior entrance to Snowcrag Keep and due to some heavy delays and setbacks I\'ve still yet to clutter the dungeon.
- I\'ve added Lucius Aventum to Vilemyr Inn in Ivarstead to begin setting the foundation for the prequel quest which will allow the player to grab a sneak peak of the dungeon.
- Added the basic Goltoor Mace and the Goltoor Ingot. Both of which are not achievable save by console commands.

v6A
I have finished the main entrance to Snowcrag Keep and need to clutter it. This release is meant for alpha testers to comment back their framerates in the new dungeon.

v5A
This is a simple pre-release alpha version of The Dragonborn Legacy that adds a the beginnings of a new dungeon and changes the following perks from the previous release which can be found in the Alteration tree:

- Resonant Thu\'um
  -Requires a damaging shout to unlock
  -Increases Shout damage by 10%/25%/40%/55%/70%/85%/100%
  -Ranks are unlocked at levels 1/10/20/30/40/50/60

- Vocal Renewal
  -Decreases Shout Cooldown by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
  -Ranks are unlocked at levels 10/25/40/55/70

- Boisterous Thu\'um (not tested)
  -Increases Shout (non-damage) Magnitude by 20%/40%/60%/80%/100%
  -Ranks are unlocked at levels 10/25/40/55/70

- Lasting Echos (not tested)
  -Increases Shout effect duration by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25%
  -Ranks are unlocked at levels 20/35/50/65/80

Please comment and send feedback.

If you are interested to see what else is in the works, feel free to visit our Nexus thread.
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/467279-the-dragonborn-legacy/

INSTALLATION
Simply drop the data folder in to your Skyrim folder.
author: Budz42

files.name: Dragonborn Legacy
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Resonant Thu\'um and Vocal Renewal perks to balance them out.
Added the beginning of Snowcrag Depths.
